channel.title: Ie9 on David Calhoun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ie9 on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: Targeting Internet Explorer (IE): the age-old struggle
item.description: As long as I can remember, developers have always been trying to target IE one way or another. Thanks to the wonders of modern technology, there have been multiple ways to pull this off. I guess I really haven’t been keeping up with the latest frontend trends (doh!), as I’ve just recently discovered this very elegant solution circa 2008 offered by Paul Irish, which sticks a class on the body tag using proprietary conditional IE tags (no JavaScript magic needed here!
